contents.title: Policy & Geopolitics
contents.description: The Fed signals gradual tapering by year-end

contents.title: Macro Indicators
contents.description: **US job growth slows sharply amid labor shortage**

contents.title: Financial Markets
contents.description:
**Equity markets rally despite mixed earnings**

US equities closed their strongest month since November 2020

contents.title: Earnings
contents.description:
**Tech earnings mixed; Amazon and Apple miss estimates**

Apple Q3 revenues increased 29% YoY to $83.36 billion but were 2% below estimates

contents.title: Sentiment
contents.description:
**Consumer sentiment falls amid inflation fears**

The Consumer Sentiment Index of the University of Michigan fell to 71.1 in October from 72.8 in September

contents.title: The Month Ahead
contents.description:
1. Global vaccine rollout and booster shots

2. President Biden’s $1.85 trillion spending plan and infrastructure bill

3. Policy changes in the US and Europe
